thread.title: Glenn Stephens

author: Glenn Stephens
title: Glenn Stephens
text: I was amazed at the level of patience as well as knowledge on how to assist me in getting my LazAzza Espresso point machine working again. I was on the phone for quite some time struggling to figure how to get the machine working again. I am not very savvy when it comes to the mechanical workings of machines, but through continued conversation to make sure I understood what to do, I was finally able to grasp what to do. It was only because of the patience of Tracy that allowed me to get my machine working again! I have had it for over 10 years and it still keeps on working. Thanks again Tracy!!
